mappings.callToWorship: Let us come before the Lord with thanksgiving, for His goodness endures forever. His mercies are new every morning, great is His faithfulness!
mappings.prayerPoints: Thank God for His faithful presence in your life. Remember His past goodness and trust Him for the future.
mappings.benediction: May the goodness of the Lord follow you all the days of your life, and may you dwell in His house forever.

mappings.callToWorship: Holy, Holy, Holy is the Lord God Almighty, who was and is and is to come! Let us worship Him in the splendor of His holiness.
mappings.prayerPoints: Acknowledge God's holiness and majesty. Confess any areas where you have fallen short of His glory.
mappings.benediction: May you walk in holiness before the Lord, reflecting His glory in all that you do.

mappings.callToWorship: Let everything that has breath praise the Lord! Enter His gates with thanksgiving and His courts with praise.
mappings.prayerPoints: Offer praise to God for who He is. Let your heart overflow with gratitude and joy.
mappings.benediction: May your life be a continuous song of praise to the One who is worthy of all honor and glory.

mappings.callToWorship: For God so loved the world that He gave His only Son. Let us respond to His amazing love with hearts of worship.
mappings.prayerPoints: Thank God for His unconditional love. Pray for the ability to share His love with others.
mappings.benediction: May the love of Christ dwell richly in your hearts, and may you be rooted and grounded in His eternal love.

mappings.callToWorship: Behold the Lamb of God who takes away the sin of the world. Let us remember His sacrifice with grateful hearts.
mappings.prayerPoints: Reflect on the price Christ paid for your salvation. Thank Him for His willing sacrifice.
mappings.benediction: May the message of the cross be the power of God in your life, bringing salvation and transformation.

mappings.callToWorship: He is risen! Death has been conquered and the grave has lost its sting. Let us celebrate the risen King!
mappings.prayerPoints: Thank God for the power of resurrection. Pray for new life in areas that feel dead or hopeless.
mappings.benediction: May the resurrection power of Christ fill you with hope and strength for every challenge you face.

mappings.callToWorship: Come, Holy Spirit, fill this place with Your presence. Breathe on us and renew us with Your fire.
mappings.prayerPoints: Ask for a fresh filling of the Holy Spirit. Pray for guidance, wisdom, and spiritual fruit.
mappings.benediction: May the Holy Spirit be your constant companion, leading you into all truth and empowering you for service.

mappings.callToWorship: The Lord reigns! Let the earth rejoice. Crown Him Lord of all and bow before His throne.
mappings.prayerPoints: Surrender every area of your life to His lordship. Acknowledge His authority over all things.
mappings.benediction: May you live under the gracious rule of King Jesus, experiencing the peace and joy of His kingdom.

mappings.callToWorship: The Lord who heals is among us. Bring your brokenness and trust in His restoring power.
mappings.prayerPoints: Pray for healing - physical, emotional, and spiritual. Trust God as Jehovah Rapha, the Lord who heals.
mappings.benediction: May the healing touch of Jesus bring wholeness to every area of your life.

mappings.callToWorship: Be still and know that He is God. Let the peace that surpasses understanding guard your hearts.
mappings.prayerPoints: Release your anxieties to God. Pray for His peace to reign in situations that cause worry.
mappings.benediction: May the peace of God which transcends all understanding guard your heart and mind in Christ Jesus.

mappings.callToWorship: The Lord is our strength and our shield. In Him we find our fortress and our deliverer.
mappings.prayerPoints: Ask God for strength in your weakness. Trust in His power rather than your own ability.
mappings.benediction: May you go forth in the strength of the Lord, finding Him to be your rock and fortress.

mappings.callToWorship: The Lord is our Shepherd; we shall not want. He leads us beside still waters and restores our souls.
mappings.prayerPoints: Thank God for His shepherding care. Ask Him to lead you in paths of righteousness.
mappings.benediction: May the Good Shepherd lead you through every valley, providing all you need and guiding you home.

mappings.callToWorship: Jesus is the Light of the world. Whoever follows Him will never walk in darkness but have the light of life.
mappings.prayerPoints: Ask God to reveal any darkness in your life. Pray to walk in His light and reflect it to others.
mappings.benediction: May the light of Christ shine brightly through you, dispelling every shadow of darkness.

mappings.callToWorship: We have this hope as an anchor for our souls, firm and secure. Let us hold fast to the promises of God.
mappings.prayerPoints: Renew your hope in God's promises. Trust Him with the uncertainties of life.
mappings.benediction: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust in Him, overflowing with hope by the Holy Spirit.

mappings.callToWorship: At the name of Jesus every knee shall bow. Let us exalt the name that is above every name.
mappings.prayerPoints: Thank God for the power in the name of Jesus. Pray that His name be glorified through your life.
mappings.benediction: May you go forth in the name of Jesus, carrying His authority and presence wherever you go.

mappings.callToWorship: Jesus Christ is the same yesterday, today, and forever. His love endures through all generations.
mappings.prayerPoints: Thank God for His unchanging nature. Trust in His eternal promises that never fail.
mappings.benediction: May the eternal God be your refuge, and may His everlasting arms uphold you always.

mappings.callToWorship: Let us come boldly to the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy and find grace to help in time of need.
mappings.prayerPoints: Commit to a deeper prayer life. Bring your needs and the needs of others before God.
mappings.benediction: May your prayer life flourish as you commune daily with the Father who hears and answers.

mappings.callToWorship: Where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom. Let us celebrate the liberty we have in Christ.
mappings.prayerPoints: Thank God for freedom from sin and bondage. Pray for those who are still in chains.
mappings.benediction: May you walk in the glorious freedom of the children of God, never returning to bondage.

mappings.callToWorship: Come, let us worship and bow down; let us kneel before the Lord our Maker, for He is our God.
mappings.prayerPoints: Examine your heart and offer pure worship. Ask God to make you a true worshiper in spirit and truth.
mappings.benediction: May your whole life be an act of worship, bringing glory to God in all that you do.

mappings.callToWorship: Great is the Lord and greatly to be praised! His greatness is unsearchable, His wonders are without number.
mappings.prayerPoints: Reflect on the amazing works of God in your life. Let wonder and awe fill your worship.
mappings.benediction: May you never cease to be amazed by God's goodness, and may His wonders continually fill you with praise.
